Value.label: Country Voltage
Value.Help: Voltage to calculate wattage from amperage. US=120. EU,ANZ=240.

Value.label: Power changed
Value.Help: Automatic report only when power is changed.

Value.label: Wattage Threshold
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (whole HEM).

Value.label: Wattage Threshold C1
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 1).

Value.label: Wattage Threshold C2
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 2).

Value.label: Wattage Threshold C3
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 3).

Value.label: Wattage Percentage Change
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (whole HEM).

Value.label: Wattage Percentage Change C1
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 1).

Value.label: Wattage Percentage Change C2
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 2).

Value.label: Wattage Percentage Change C3
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 3).

Value.label: Accumulate energy
Value.Help: Accumulate energy when Battery Powered.

Value.label: USB powered
Value.Help: This byte denotes whether the product is using batteries (value = 0) or using USB power (value = 1).

Value.label: Reset #101-103
Value.Help: Reset to default parameters number 101-103. Any value other then 0 will initiate this reset.

Value.label: Group 1 Reports
Value.Help: Which reports need to send in group1. Format is as follows: Byte 1 (msb): Reserved Byte 2: Reserved Byte 3: Bit 7: reserved Bit 6: reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for watts) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for watts) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for watts) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 4 (lsb): Bit 7: reserved Bit 6: reserved Bit 5: reserved Bit 4: reserved Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (whole HEM) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for watts) at the group time interval (whole HEM) Bit 1: Auto Send Multilevel Sensor Report (for watts) at the group time interval (whole HEM) Bit 0: Auto Send Battery Report at the group time interval (whole HEM)

Value.label: Group 2 Reports
Value.Help: Which reports need to send in group2. Format is as follows: Byte 1 (msb): Reserved Byte 2: Reserved Byte 3: Bit 7: reserved Bit 6: reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for watts) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for watts) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for watts) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 4 (lsb): Bit 7: reserved Bit 6: reserved Bit 5: reserved Bit 4: reserved Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (whole HEM) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for watts) at the group time interval (whole HEM) Bit 1: Auto Send Multilevel Sensor Report (for watts) at the group time interval (whole HEM) Bit 0: Auto Send Battery Report at the group time interval (whole HEM)

Value.label: Group 3 Reports
Value.Help: Which reports need to send in group3. Format is as follows: Byte 1 (msb): Reserved Byte 2: Reserved Byte 3: Bit 7: reserved Bit 6: reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for watts) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for watts) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for watts) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 4 (lsb): Bit 7: reserved Bit 6: reserved Bit 5: reserved Bit 4: reserved Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (whole HEM) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for watts) at the group time interval (whole HEM) Bit 1: Auto Send Multilevel Sensor Report (for watts) at the group time interval (whole HEM) Bit 0: Auto Send Battery Report at the group time interval (whole HEM)

Value.label: Reset #111-113
Value.Help: Reset to default parameters number 111-113. Any value other then 0 will initiate this reset.

Value.label: Group 1 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 1.

Value.label: Group 2 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 2.

Value.label: Group 3 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 3.

Value.label: Unit Recalibration (dangerous)
Value.Help: Re-calibrate (will destroy factory calibration). CONTACT AEON LABS before using.

Value.label: Device Tag
Value.Help: Device tag.

Value.label: Reset default configuration
Value.Help: Reset to the default configuration.
